rooms.description: A spacious living area adjacent to the courtyard offering ample daylight and Vastu compliance.
A serene bedroom designed to foster rest with a west-facing window for optimal relaxation.
Comfortable bedroom ensuring privacy and natural light exposure.
A guest room that embodies traditional Kerala aesthetics with modern conveniences.
An ergonomic kitchen area adjacent to the central courtyard ensuring ventilation and natural light.
A dining space integrated with the living room to facilitate family gatherings.
Well-placed bathroom ensuring privacy and ease of access from the bedrooms.
A dedicated storage area for kitchen supplies located conveniently near the dining area.

openings.description: The main entrance is designed to be welcoming and aligned with Vastu principles. It ensures a harmonious energy flow into the home.
Provides access from the interior rooms to the central courtyard ensuring natural ventilation and light.
Secondary entrances for utilities and service purposes. Ensures separation from main living areas.
